articles.title: Queen of Denmark Margrethe II announces abdication live on TV - BBC.com
articles.description: Margrethe II, who has reigned for 52 years, will step down on 14 January to be replaced by her son.
articles.content:
By Jacqueline HowardBBC News
Queen Margrethe II announced her abdication during her annual New Year's speech.
Denmark's Queen Margrethe II has announced her surprise abdication in a new year TV add… [+3070 chars]
